attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I downloaded this to talk to trump but instead i got no communication from talk about rude ,it took forever to download and took up so much storage like would not recommend if you roaches in your house or murder hornets

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I had a hard time trying to control this app properly! Not organized well enough for a news app. Disappointed and distraught. Never again using this app! No more bunker boi 2020😾💅🏼✨😀 give me my tiktok back 😻😡😼❤️💅🏼🥰👁👄👁

attributes.title: Wii
attributes.review: This app literally didn’t help at all. It kept making these weird sounds come from my phone and my phone kept dying for now reason every time I opened the app

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP😣🦶
attributes.review: this app when I downloaded made my phone explode into millions of pieces it set my house on fire and I woke up homeless not to mention the creator trump came to my house and threw my car into a dumpster while driving the dumpster off the cliff🧗. Rip Gertrude my cat.🐱

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: Let us keep TikTok as it is one of our few way to keep in touch with the Gen Z generation. Removing TikTok is like removing your wall which means that TikTok is our foundation like your wall is. All I’m saying is just give us back our app.

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: decided to finally download the app just for it to keep constantly glitching and shutting down 🙄 the app also run slow . 10/10 WOULD NOT recommend

attributes.title: Worst experience
attributes.review: I got the app and it didn’t work whatsoever it also was super racist and xenophobic towards people as well as sexist and ugly and stupid and dumb and evil and horrible. I heard the creator of this app is a rapist so I have no idea why it’s even up. TAKE THIS DOWN.

attributes.title: not worth the download
attributes.review: This app was too hard to navigate and left no reasons to vote for Donald trump in the upcoming 2020 election. Over all had some terrible content and was a waste of time scrolling through.

attributes.title: 👁👄👁🟠✨✨✨to America’s orange president
attributes.review: One star for trying to ban TikTok. Also I try to use the app while walking my pet crocodile and I got so focused trying to use the app that my cici the crocodile got lost. It’s been five months since I have seen her.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!
attributes.review: This app is the worst and took so long to download on my phone. This app might need an update because it keeps on kicking me out and won’t let me click on anything. Do not get this app
